name: Wirt's Leg
flavorText: "Poor Wirt. I did all that was possible for the child, but I know that he despises that wooden peg I was forced to attach to his leg. His wounds were hideous. No one--and especially such a young child--should have to suffer the way he did." —Pepin
flavorTextHtml:
"Poor Wirt. I did all that was possible for the child, but I know that he despises that wooden peg I was forced to attach to his leg. His wounds were hideous. No one--and especially such a young child--should have to suffer the way he did."

—Pepin
